hanzi-su-wiki:
梢

Значения

Верхушка дерева

Мнемоника

Деревья 木 похожи тем, что верхушки у них одинаковы 肖.
purpleculture_pinyin:
shāo
tip of branch
верхушка ветки
rtega_mnemonic:
梢梢RSpointed tip of something long like a branch, twig, treetop, rudder
  • part of a tree 木 that resembles the entire 肖 tree
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 根
Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
树梢 [ shù shāo ]: the tip of a tree; treetop
眉梢 [ méi shāo ]: tip of brow
末梢 [ mò shāo ]: tip; end; last few days
眼梢 [ yǎn shāo ]: corner of eye near temple
盯梢 [ dīng shāo ]: to follow sb; to tail; to shadow
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like
heisig_chinese_memo: At Christmas time, on the treetops, people used to place great big candles (Now we usually place a star instead).
heisig_constituent: treetops, tree, wood, resemblance, spark, candle, small, little, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisig_story: As the days grow shorter and shorter, or so the northern European myth goes, the fear grows that the sun will take its leave of us altogether, abandoning the world to total darkness. Fixing candles to the branches of evergreen trees, it was believed, would lure the sun back (like things attracting like things), whence the custom of the lighted tree that eventually found its way into our Christmas customs. The story is a lot longer and more complex than that, but it should help to fix the image of climbing high up into the treetops to fix candles on the tree.
koohiiStory1: At Christmas time, on the treetops, people used to place great big candles (Now we usually place a star instead).
koohiiStory2: If you cut off the treetops, they still resemble the trees they used to be part of. Treetops=tree resemblance.
Ru_Words:
梢こずえ
  • маленькие ветки
  • верхушка дерева
    • warodai
    末梢まっしょう
  • кончик ветки, вершина [дерева], перен. самый край, конец
    • warodai
    末梢まっしょうの
  • окраинный, конечный
    • warodai
Ru_trainchinese:
shāo: (сущ) кончик ветки или другого тонкого предмета (редко используется отдельно)
sào: (сущ) конус; конусность (см. 锥度)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: resembling (肖) the trees (木) themselves are the treetops
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At Christmas time, on the treetops, people used to place great big candles (Now we usually place a star instead).
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Wood " to " Shaw " sound. The original meaning is the end of the branch. "Shuowen": "Shoots, woods. From woods, Xiaosheng." Xu Kai's "Biography": "Shoots, twigs also." Such as the Northern Zhou Yuxin's "Dead Tree Fu": "The forest shoots are a hundred hectares, Cha For a thousand years." Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Send Wei Langsi to Chengdu": "To ask about Nanxi bamboo, pull the tip and close the wall."

" Shoots " also mean the branches of plants, such as small firewood and bamboo poles. "Huainanzi. "Bing Lue": "Drag the shoots with firewood, and raise the dust to raise the husks, so they are the ones who enlist their eyes." Gao Luu's note: "Shots, Xiaochai also." The whole sentence refers to dragging branches and raising dust to confuse the enemy's vision. "Han Shu. "Li Yue Zhi": "Decorate jade shoots with dancing songs, and the body will be like eternal hope." Yan Shi's ancient note: "The shoots, the poles are also held by the dancers. The jade shoots are decorated with jade."

" Shot " is extended to mean the end, the end. "Dialects": "Shots, fullness." Such as "Selected Works. Yan Yanzhi's "Fu on the White Horse in Ochre": "Appreciate the attachment of muscles and bones, and plant hair at the tip." Li Shan's note: "The tip, the tail hangs down." "Song History. "Song Qi Biography": "The front of the formation should not be moved lightly, and the front of the formation should be protected from the sideways rushing." "The top of the formation" refers to the end of the army array. The whole sentence means that the tail of the army cannot be easily moved to prevent the enemy's cavalry from attacking.

" Shoot " means the stern. "Words. "Mubu": "saw, rudder and stern." For example, Liu Zongyuan of the Tang Dynasty "You Chaoyang Rock Sui Deng Xiting": "The mountains and rivers on which you depend, the boats are in vain and the long tips." This meaning is also written as "艄".
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " to " Shaw ". The original meaning is the end of the branch, and also the branch of the plant.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「肖」聲。本義是樹枝的末端。《說文》：「梢，木也。从木，肖聲。」徐鍇《繫傳》：「梢，樹枝末也。」如北周庾信〈枯樹賦〉：「森梢百頃，槎枿千年。」唐代杜甫〈送韋郎司直歸成都〉：「為問南溪竹，抽梢合過牆。」

　　「梢」又表示植物的枝節，如小柴、竹竿等。《淮南子．兵略》：「曳梢肆柴，揚塵起堨，所以營其目者。」高誘注：「梢，小柴也。」全句指拖著樹枝，揚起塵土，以迷惑敵人的視覺。《漢書．禮樂志》：「飾玉梢以舞歌，體招搖若永望。」顏師古注：「梢，竿也，舞者所持。玉梢，以玉飾之也。」

　　「梢」引申表示末端、盡頭。《方言》：「梢，盡也。」如《文選．顏延之〈赭白馬賦〉》：「徒觀其附筋樹骨，垂梢植髮。」李善注：「梢，尾之垂者。」《宋史．宋琪傳》：「陣梢不可輕動，蓋防橫騎奔衝。」「陣梢」指軍隊陣列的末端，全句意謂軍隊的陣尾不可輕易調動，以防備敵方的騎兵衝擊。

　　「梢」表示船尾。《字彙．木部》：「梢，船舵尾。」如唐代柳宗元〈游朝陽岩遂登西亭〉：「所賴山水客，扁舟枉長梢。」這個意義又寫作「艄」。
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「肖」聲。本義是樹枝的末端，又表示植物的枝節。

梢(こずえ): treetop

從「 木 」，「 肖 」聲。本義是樹枝的末端。《說文》：「梢，木也。从木，肖聲。」徐鍇《繫傳》：「梢，樹枝末也。」如北周庾信〈枯樹賦〉：「森梢百頃，槎枿千年。」唐代杜甫〈送韋郎司直歸成都〉：「為問南溪竹，抽梢合過牆。」 「 梢 」又表示植物的枝節，如小柴、竹竿等。《淮南子．兵略》：「曳梢肆柴，揚塵起堨，所以營其目者。」高誘注：「梢，小柴也。」全句指拖著樹枝，揚起塵土，以迷惑敵人的視覺。《漢書．禮樂志》：「飾玉梢以舞歌，體招搖若永望。」顏師古注：「梢，竿也，舞者所持。玉梢，以玉飾之也。」 「 梢 」引申表示末端、盡頭。《方言》：「梢，盡也。」如《文選．顏延之〈赭白馬賦〉》：「徒觀其附筋樹骨，垂梢植髮。」李善注：「梢，尾之垂者。」《宋史．宋琪傳》：「陣梢不可輕動，蓋防橫騎奔衝。」「陣梢」指軍隊陣列的末端，全句意謂軍隊的陣尾不可輕易調動，以防備敵方的騎兵衝擊。 「 梢 」表示船尾。《字彙．木部》：「梢，船舵尾。」如唐代柳宗元〈游朝陽岩遂登西亭〉：「所賴山水客，扁舟枉長梢。」這個意義又寫作「 艄 」。
From " Wood" to " Shaw" sound. The original meaning is the end of the branch. "Shuowen": "Shoots, woods. From woods, Xiaosheng." Xu Kai's "Biography": "Shoots, twigs also." Such as the Northern Zhou Yuxin's "Dead Tree Fu": "The forest shoots are a hundred hectares, Cha For a thousand years." Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Send Wei Langsi to Chengdu": "To ask about Nanxi bamboo, pull the tip and close the wall." " Shoots" also mean the branches of plants, such as small firewood and bamboo poles. "Huainanzi. "Bing Lue": "Drag the shoots with firewood, and raise the dust to raise the husks, so they are the ones who enlist their eyes." Gao Luu's note: "Shots, Xiaochai also." The whole sentence refers to dragging branches and raising dust to confuse the enemy's vision. "Han Shu. "Li Yue Zhi": "Decorate jade shoots with dancing songs, and the body will be like eternal hope." Yan Shi's ancient note: "The shoots, the poles are also held by the dancers. The jade shoots are decorated with jade." " Shot" is extended to mean the end, the end. "Dialects": "Shots, fullness." Such as "Selected Works. Yan Yanzhi's "Fu on the White Horse in Ochre": "Appreciate the attachment of muscles and bones, and plant hair at the tip." Li Shan's note: "The tip, the tail hangs down." "Song History. "Song Qi Biography": "The front of the formation should not be moved lightly, and the front of the formation should be protected from the sideways rushing." "The top of the formation" refers to the end of the army array. The whole sentence means that the tail of the army cannot be easily moved to prevent the enemy's cavalry from attacking. " Shoot" means the stern. "Words. "Mubu": "saw, rudder and stern." For example, Liu Zongyuan of the Tang Dynasty "You Chaoyang Rock Sui Deng Xiting": "The mountains and rivers on which you depend, the boats are in vain and the long tips." This meaning is also written as " 艄".

梢字的基本解释

梢
shāo
树枝或条状物的末端：树梢。末梢。梢头。梢林。
末尾：眉梢。收梢。
古代奏乐时拿的竿子。
古同“艄”，船舵尾。

梢
sào
像圆锥体的形状。
柱形物体的横剖面向一端面逐渐缩小的形式。

梢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāo］
［《廣韻》所交切，平肴，生。］
“綃2”的被通假字。
(1)树木或其它植物的末端。
(2)树木的枝条。
(3)指竹竿。
(4)事物的末尾或一段时间的结尾。
(5)指人的肢体。
(6)船舵的尾部。
(7)泛指船尾。
(8)代指船家，艄公。
(9)方言。桶。
(10)现钱，赌本。
(11)击，扫。
(12)朝向。参见“梢空”、“梢天”。
(13)捎，捎带。
(14)指灌木。参见“梢林”。
(15)量词。犹枝或支。
(16)通“旓”。旌旗上的飘带。
[②]［xiāo］
［《集韻》思邀切，平宵，心。］
谓流水冲激。参见“梢2溝”。
[③]［shào］
［《集韻》所教切，去效，生。］
砍伐树木的枝叶。

梢字的英文翻译

◎ 梢
end, tip

梢字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梢； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页530第05
【廣韻】【正韻】所交切【集韻】師交切，?音弰。【說文】木也。【爾雅·釋木】梢，梢櫂。【郭註】木無枝柯，梢櫂長而殺者。　又竿也。樂者所執。【漢·郊祀歌·天門章】飾玉梢以舞歌。　又小柴也。【淮南子·兵略訓】曳梢肆柴。　又【字彙】船柁尾曰梢。今人謂篙師爲梢子。或作䈾。　又擊而去之曰梢。【揚雄·甘泉賦】梢夔魖而抶獝狂。　又【博雅】梢梢，小也。　又農器。【陸龜蒙·耒耜經】前如桯而樛者曰轅，後加柄而喬者曰梢。　又梢雲，山名。【左思·吳都賦】梢雲無以踰，嶰谷弗能連。　又與旓同。旌旗之旒也。【揚雄·河東賦】揚左纛，被雲梢。　又【韻會】思邀切，音宵。【周禮·冬官考工記】《匠人》梢溝三十里而廣倍。【鄭註】梢，謂水潄齧之溝。　又【說文】山巧切，音㪢shǎo。木長貌。　又【集韻】所敎切，音哨。剡木上殺也。　又【集韻】色角切，音朔。義同《爾雅》。

考證：〔【揚雄·甘泉賦】梢夔魖而扶獝狂。〕　謹照原文扶改抶。
梢字的源字形

梢字的起名意思

树木的末端。

Tip
Basic explanation of words
Tip
shāo
The ends of branches or strips: treetops. tip. Tip. Shoot forest.
At the end: the tip of the eyebrows. Close up.
The pole used when playing music in ancient times.
Gu Tong "stern", rudder stern.
Tip
sào
Like the shape of a cone.
A form in which the cross section of a cylindrical object gradually shrinks toward one end surface.
Tip
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shāo]
["Guangyun" cross cut, flat food, raw. ]
"绡2" was passed falsely.
(1) The ends of trees or other plants.
(2) The branches of trees.
(3) Refers to bamboo poles.
(4) The end of a thing or the end of a period of time.
(5) Refers to human limbs.
(6) The tail of the rudder.
(7) Refers to the stern in general.
(8) Refers to the shipowner, and the public.
(9) Dialects. barrel.
(10) Cash money, gambling capital.
(11) Hit, sweep.
(12) Orientation. See "Sao Kong", "Sao Tian".
(13) Piggyback, piggyback.
(14) Refers to shrubs. See "Shooting Forest".
(15) Quantifiers. Still branches or branches.
(16) Through "旓". The streamers on the flags.
[②]［xiāo］
["Jiyun" thought to cut, calm night, heart. ]
That is the flow of water. See "tip 2 ditch".
[③]［shào］
["Jiyun" teaches cutting, de-efficiency, and birth. ]
Cut down the branches and leaves of trees.
Tip

◎ Tip
end, tip

[Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu] Shao Kui is mad and crazy.　[Bo Ya] Shao Shao, Xiao Ye.　Farmer again. 【Lu Guimeng·Lei Lei Jing】The former is like 桯 but the 樛 said Yuan, the latter adds the handle and Qiao says the shoot.　Saoyun again, the name of the mountain. Name meaning
The end of the tree.
形声字。木表意,篆书形体像棵树,表示树梢;肖( xiao)表声,肖有类似、相似之义,表示树尖与树枝的末端形状相似,
故都称作梢。本义是树尖或树枝的末端。
①树尖或树枝的末端:树~「枝~。②事物的末尾或时间
的尽头:眉~「末~|春~。
~头 鞭~ 辫~ 町~ 钉~ 发~ 下~ 眼~
梢
shão
植|
梢。
Пиктофонетические символы.
Деревянный знак означает, что сценарий печати похож на дерево, что означает верхушку дерева; Сяо (сяо) означает, что звук похож и похож, что означает, что кончик дерева и конец ветви похожи по форме, поэтому все они называются вершинами.
Первоначальное значение - кончик дерева или конец ветки.
①Вершина дерева или конец ветки: дерево ~ "Ветка ~. ②Конец вещей или конец времени: бровь ~" конец ~ | пружина ~. ~ Плеть по голове ~ коса ~ гвоздь ~ волосы ~ следующий ~ глаз ~
Кончик
шао
Завод |
Стрелять.
shāo, *, [c][i]в, coчeт., тakжe[/c], [c][/i][/c]xiāo
I сущ.
1) вершина (дерева); заостренная кверху крона; верхушка, макушка
森梢 густые верхушки деревьев
柳树梢儿都绿了 верхушки ив зазеленели
2) кончик, конец (чего-л.); хвост
辫梢 кончик косы
鞭梢儿 хвост (конец) бича (плети)
3) начало, зачин (дела)
还(hái)没下梢 начало (делу) ещё не положено
4) перо руля; корма лодки; лодка
梢户 лодочник
5) хворост; сучья, ветки
梢芟 ветки и тростник (для оплётки запруды)
6) * жезл (в руках танцора, певца)
玉梢 жезл, украшенный яшмой
7) * фестоны на знамени
被云梢 фестоны знамён, закрывающие тучи
8) диал. низкорослое дерево, куст
梢林 заросли кустарника, чащоба
II гл.
1) вм. 捎 1, А, 1) (задеть концом, коснуться)
2) вм. 捎 1. А, 3) (выкашивать; уничтожать: отгонять)
